msg: bug 5256: if we short-circuit, don't do auto-learning

author: felicity
msg: when paths are specified in a config (such as 'include ~/foo'), things like '~' aren't properly handled.  call sed_path to clean that up.  also, a debug statement was improperly set to the plugin channel instead of config.
